Title: PartitionObjectSource

Description: A class representing a partition process from a data source. Useful for folding cross-validation analysis

Field Detail

partition

protected Partition partition
The partition applied to the data set

Constructor Detail

PartitionSource

public PartitionSource(ObjectSource source,
                       Partition partition,
                       int group,
                       boolean useGroup)
Constructor: Creates a sampling object with marked data records

Parameters:
source - Data source to be analized
partition - Partition applied to the data set. I don't check if the partition has the same size of the data set. I suppose is ok.
group - The key group in the partition: For using it (testing) or discarding it (training)
useGroup - If the key group is used (the iteration is on the group only) or discarded (the iteration is done over the data set without including the group)
Method Detail

init

public void init(int group,
                 boolean useGroup)
Inits the partition ObjectSource

Parameters:
group - The key group in the partition: For using it (testing) or discarding it (training)
useGroup - If the key group is used (the iteration is on the group only) or discarded (the iteration is done over the data set without including the group)
